Package com.ibm.asyncutil.locks

Interface AsyncLock

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FairAsyncLock

    public interface AsyncLock
    An asynchronously acquirable mutual exclusion lock.

    Implementations will specify whether their lock acquisition is fair or not; this interface does not define this requirement.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  AsyncLock.LockToken
      A lock token indicating that the associated lock has been exclusively acquired.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CompletionStage<AsyncLock.LockToken> acquireLock​()
      Exclusively acquires this lock.
      static AsyncLock create​()
      Creates an AsyncLock
      static AsyncLock createFair​()
      Creates a fair AsyncLock
      Optional<AsyncLock.LockToken> tryLock​()
      Attempts to immediately acquire the lock, returning a populated Optional if the lock is not currently held.

    • Method Detail

      • acquireLock

        CompletionStage<AsyncLock.LockToken> acquireLock​()
        Exclusively acquires this lock. The returned stage will complete when the lock is exclusively acquired by this caller. The stage may already be complete if the lock was not held.

        The AsyncLock.LockToken held by the returned stage is used to release the lock after it has been acquired and the lock-protected action has completed.

        Returns:
        A CompletionStage which will complete with a AsyncLock.LockToken when the lock has been exclusively acquired

      • tryLock

        Optional<AsyncLock.LockToken> tryLock​()
        Attempts to immediately acquire the lock, returning a populated Optional if the lock is not currently held.
        Returns:
        An Optional holding a AsyncLock.LockToken if the lock is not held; otherwise an empty Optional

      • create

        static AsyncLock create​()
        Creates an AsyncLock

        The returned lock is only guaranteed to meet the requirements of AsyncLock; in particular, no guarantee of fairness is provided.

        Returns:
        a new AsyncLock

      • createFair

        static AsyncLock createFair​()
        Creates a fair AsyncLock
        Returns:
        a new AsyncLock with a fair implementation
